pages.text: The Deadtime Watch contains a skull, confined by materials imbued with blood and souls, animated by a secret ingredient only Harbingers possess. It is able to stop time and freeze all entities and objects for 15 seconds in a radius of 16 blocks around its user, activated by $(4)right-clicking$().
This unique watch stops time... for a time. Unlike death, time moves on. Those who stood still with time move on also... unless they're dead.
